ISSUE.TITLE: Add CSS style for div of "Customer Enters Quantity" functionality
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: While I was working with the new Customer Enters Quantity functionality in nopCommerce 3.90 I came up with a small issue. The <div> that is holding the label and the textbox doesn't have a class name. This will make it difficult to be styled with CSS. Maybe you should consider adding a unique class for the Quantity Box. Source: http://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/46315/minor-changes-request-for-nopcommerce-390.aspx#184622
